data.title: Mother given jail sentence for sending her son, named Jihad, to school wearing a T shirt with the words 'I am a bomb' and 'Born on 9/11' on it. She said it was a "joke".

Canadian University distributed condoms with safe sex message stapled to them. The staples punctured the condoms rendering them unsafe.
